Text: Thanks for all the OS's and gonna really yer releases for sure, take it easy.

If you want recycle bin to show, do this.

Go to start menu > RUN > type "GPEDIT.MSC" (without quotes) > User Configuration > Administrative Templates > Desktop > on right side select an option by name "Remove Recycle Bin Icon on Desktop" (Double click on it) > Select Disabled > Hit apply and OK
